verses.verse: "I permitted Myself to be <S%H1875>sought<s%> by those who did not <S%H7592>ask<s%> [for Me;] I permitted Myself to be <S%H4672>found<s%> by those who did not <S%H1245>seek<s%> Me. I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>'Here<s%> am I, <S%H2009>here<s%> am I,' To a <S%H1471>nation<s%> which did not <S%H7121>call<s%> on My <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"I have <S%H6566>spread<s%> out My <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long to a <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> Who <S%H1980>walk<s%> [in] the <S%H1870>way<s%> which is not <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H310>following<s%> their own <S%H4284>thoughts,<s%>

A <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H3707>provoke<s%> Me to My <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H2076>Offering<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> in <S%H1593>gardens<s%> and <S%H6999>burning<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on <S%H3843>bricks;<s%>

Who <S%H3427>sit<s%> among <S%H6913>graves,<s%> and <S%H3885>spend<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> in <S%H5341>secret<s%> <S%H5341>places;<s%> Who <S%H398>eat<s%> swine's <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> And the <S%H4839>broth<s%> of <S%H6292>unclean<s%> <S%H6292>meat<s%> is [in] their <S%H3627>pots.<s%>

"Who <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7126>'Keep<s%> to yourself, do not <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> me, For I am <S%H6942>holier<s%> than you!' <S%H428>These<s%> are <S%H6227>smoke<s%> in My <S%H639>nostrils,<s%> A <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H3344>burns<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> it is <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me, I will not <S%H2814>keep<s%> <S%H2814>silent,<s%> but I will <S%H9608>repay;<s%> I will even <S%H9608>repay<s%> into their <S%H2436>bosom,<s%>

Both their own <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their fathers <S%H1>together,<s%> <S%H9191>"says<s%> the <S%H559>Lord.<s%>" <S%H3068>Because<s%> they have <S%H834>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on the <S%H6999>mountains,<s%> And <S%H2022>scorned<s%> Me on the <S%H2778>hills,<s%> Therefore I will <S%H1389>measure<s%> their <S%H4058>former<s%> <S%H7223>work<s%> into their <S%H6468>bosom.<s%>"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "As the <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H811>cluster,<s%> And one <S%H559>says,<s%> 'Do not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it, for there is <S%H1293>benefit<s%> in it,' <S%H3651>So<s%> I will <S%H6213>act<s%> on <S%H4616>behalf<s%> of My <S%H5650>servants<s%> In order not to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them.

"And I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2233>offspring<s%> from <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> And an <S%H3423>heir<s%> of My <S%H2022>mountains<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> Even My <S%H972>chosen<s%> <S%H972>ones<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> it, And My <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

"And <S%H8289>Sharon<s%> shall be a <S%H5116>pasture<s%> <S%H5116>land<s%> for <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> And the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor<s%> a <S%H7258>resting<s%> <S%H7258>place<s%> for <S%H1241>herds,<s%> For My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> Me.

"But you who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7913>Who<s%> <S%H7913>forget<s%> My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> Who <S%H6186>set<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> for <S%H1409>Fortune,<s%> And who <S%H4390>fill<s%> [cups] with <S%H4469>mixed<s%> <S%H4469>wine<s%> for <S%H4507>Destiny,<s%>

I will <S%H4487>destine<s%> you for the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> of you shall <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H3766>down<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter.<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> I <S%H7121>called,<s%> but you did not <S%H6030>answer;<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> but you did not <S%H8085>hear.<s%> And you <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in My <S%H5869>sight,<s%> And <S%H977>chose<s%> that in <S%H834>which<s%> I did not <S%H2654>delight.<s%>"

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> My <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> but you shall be <S%H7456>hungry.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> My <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H8354>drink,<s%> but you shall be <S%H6770>thirsty.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> My <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> but you shall be <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> My <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H7442>shout<s%> <S%H7442>joyfully<s%> with a <S%H2898>glad<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> But you shall <S%H6817>cry<s%> out with a <S%H3511>heavy<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> And you shall <S%H3213>wail<s%> with a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>

"And you will <S%H5117>leave<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> for a <S%H7621>curse<s%> to My <S%H972>chosen<s%> <S%H972>ones,<s%> And the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> will <S%H4191>slay<s%> you. But My <S%H5650>servants<s%> will be <S%H7121>called<s%> by <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

<S%H834>"Because<s%> he who is <S%H1288>blessed<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> Shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> by the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H543>truth;<s%> And he who <S%H7650>swears<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> Shall <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H543>truth;<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H6869>troubles<s%> are <S%H7911>forgotten,<s%> And <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H5641>hidden<s%> from My <S%H5869>sight!<s%>

"For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H776>earth;<s%> And the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H7223>things<s%> shall not be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> or <S%H5927>come<s%> to <S%H3820>mind.<s%>

"But be <S%H7797>glad<s%> and <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> <S%H5703>forever<s%> in <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H1254>create;<s%> For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> [for] <S%H1525>rejoicing,<s%> And her <S%H5971>people<s%> [for] <S%H4885>gladness.<s%>

"I will also <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and be <S%H7797>glad<s%> in My <S%H5971>people;<s%> And there will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in her The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H1065>weeping<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H2201>crying.<s%>

<S%H3808>"No<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> will there be in it an <S%H5764>infant<s%> <S%H834>[who<s%> lives but a few] <S%H3117>days,<s%> Or an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H2205>man<s%> who does not <S%H4390>live<s%> out his <S%H3117>days;<s%> For the <S%H5288>youth<s%> will <S%H4191>die<s%> at the <S%H1121>age<s%> of one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> And the one who does not <S%H2398>reach<s%> the <S%H1121>age<s%> of one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> Shall be [thought] <S%H7043>accursed.<s%>
"And they shall <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> [them;] They shall also <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

"They shall not <S%H1129>build,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3427>inhabit,<s%> They shall not <S%H5193>plant,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H398>eat;<s%> For as the <S%H3117>lifetime<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree,<s%> [so shall be] the <S%H3117>days<s%> of My <S%H5971>people,<s%> And My <S%H972>chosen<s%> <S%H972>ones<s%> shall <S%H1086>wear<s%> out the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

"They shall not <S%H3021>labor<s%> in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> Or <S%H3205>bear<s%> [children] for <S%H928>calamity;<s%> For they are the <S%H2233>offspring<s%> of those <S%H1288>blessed<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And their <S%H6631>descendants<s%> with them.

"It will also <S%H1961>come<s%> to <S%H1961>pass<s%> that <S%H2962>before<s%> they <S%H7121>call,<s%> I will <S%H6030>answer;<s%> and while they are <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> I will <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

"The <S%H2061>wolf<s%> and the <S%H2924>lamb<s%> shall <S%H7462>graze<s%> <S%H259>together,<s%> and the <S%H9030>lion<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> like the <S%H1241>ox;<s%> and <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall be the serpent's <S%H3899>food.<s%> They shall <S%H7489>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7489>evil<s%> or <S%H7843>harm<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
